summary: The Clone Wars Is Getting A New Season
title: The Clone Wars Is Getting A New Season
body:
Disney has announced a new season of ‘Star Wars: The Clone Wars’.  The 12 episode series will be a feature of the new streaming service Disney is launching in 2019.  Matt Lanter will return to voice Anakin Skywalker, and Ashley Eckstein is back as Ashoka Tano.  Dee Bradley Baker also returns to voice to Captain Rex.  The new season will focus on the siege of Mandalore, one of the final battles of the Clone Wars.  I’d imagine this might leave some room for ‘Star Wars: Rebels” characters to reappear as well.


(h/t The Verge)

(h/t The Verge)

summary: OKAY, OKAY, OKAY. I absolutely love everything about Anakin's reaction to Ahsoka BUT LETS TALK ABOUT OBI WAN. OF FREAKING COURSE...
caption:
OKAY, OKAY, OKAY. I absolutely love everything about Anakin’s reaction to Ahsoka BUT LETS TALK ABOUT OBI WAN. OF FREAKING COURSE HE FIRST THING HE DOES IS LOOK AT ANAKIN. He’s probably thinking, “oh God what’s Anakin gonna do” and “oh shit can’t miss this” at the same time. 1000% true to his character, checking on his brother and former padawan. God, I love it hahahaha!!
(FUCK YEAH CLONE WARS RETURNS!!)

summary:
What I really want to see happen in Star Wars Episode IX... 

Star Wars: Balance Restored
title:
What I really want to see happen in Star Wars Episode IX... 

Star Wars: Balance Restored
body:
What i want to happen is that the next movie has a time jump of a month or two, the resistance have set up a base and Rey goes on different missions to find force wielders to keep safe and help. The First Order haven’t looked for the resistance or bothered to kill them all, Kylo has realised there is a bigger mission he needs to complete, which is policing the galaxy. Honestly i really don’t want Snoke to be alive in the next film. As a force ghost maybe but not actually alive tbh not in the film at all. I want Kylo to be ruling and Rey and Ben to continue to have these force connections where they appear to each other. Ben struggles to rule on his own and he asks her in one of the force connections why she had rejected him so harshly, whether she intended to kill him or not. They argue and Rey says if she wanted him dead, she would have done it when he was unconscious, she lets it slip that she has woken up and run to check that he was still alive before she left for Crait. She also tells him that she couldn’t kill him even if he wanted to  but he just passes it off as her wanting to be a Jedi. She doesn’t continue to argue that she cant kill him not because of the Jedi ways but because she feels it would destroy her very being and will to live. It would be cool to have obi wan and Yoda come to Rey and help her discover more about her life, personally i like the idea that shes a no body that was left on Jakku, and i want Anakin and Luke to go to Kylo. They explain the balance and when Ben and Rey next see each other, they realise they are the ones who need to bring the balance to the galaxy but they don’t acknowledge it to each other, but they do try and read each others mind if they think the same thing. Rey is hesitant because she still doesn’t know what Ben really wants for the galaxy, to rule it or police it. That force connection ends and in the night they both get visions of the same vision they had from the last Jedi when they touched hands, them both standing together side by side, at the time of the last Jedi, they both saw it as trying to pull each over to either the light side or the dark side. They begin to think that the force actually needs them together to bring balance. Kylo already has admitted to himself, Anakin and Luke that she is the light that creates conflict in him, and he admits he feels something towards her. Rey struggles because she feels like she cant tell Finn, Poe and Rose because they wont understand the conflict she feels. Rey goes on a mission the next day to find more force users, going back to Canto bight (Where that boy with the force lives that we saw at the end of the last Jedi) and that when she and Ben come face to face. He is already there with the child and she thinks hes going to try and take him to be a slave for the first order and they fight. Rey shows her blue (Maybe yellow?) double bladed lightsaber and they duel. But when their lightsabers touch, a spark is let out and their lightsabers turn to a grey white colour, the force telling them that they are the ones who need to bring balance. Ben immediately thinks this. Rey is angry that her lightsaber has changed and she blames it on him. Ben pins Rey to the wall and tries to calm her, and he tells her how he feels and that he cant help be completely drawn to her and that she means a lot to him, that he would give her the galaxy if she wanted it. Rey cries from a mixture of her own feelings, conflict and longing to be loved and cared for. They look into each others eyes and share a kiss, (Cheesy i know but sweet and romantic). A pulse is sent into the galaxy and everything goes silent. The balancing of the force has begun. Luke, Anakin, Obi wan and Yoda all appear to them both telling them that this is their calling and that it wont be easy but this is what the force needs. There will always be times when it becomes unbalanced and its their job to ensure its balanced again, going round together, keeping the peace side by side, the resistance and first order coming together to create ‘The New Order’. A time jump happens, 3-5 years later and the vision of them standing side by side looking out to a sunset holding hands. It pans to a view of their faces and widens to show that Rey is pregnant and Ben says “What are we going to call them?” hand on her stomach implying that they are having twins. They joke about names and then kiss in the sunlight. The view pans from there and the end titles role, Leaving the wide opportunity for the future trilogy of this children to grow up with the force and be involved with the galaxy.﻿

<3 Reylo Forever

blog.description:
Male. Star Wars/Marvel/Horror Fanatic. Supporter of Rey Skywalker (Daughter of Luke) and Kaydel Connix/Organa-Solo (Daughter of Han & Leia). Anti-Reylo. Finn is Force-Sensitive (and deserves more love & respect). Love every MCU movie except for Endgame (sorry, not sorry) so... #AntiEndgame. The Kings of Music = Michael Jackson & Elvis Presley. Favorite Slashers: Michael Myers / Freddy Krueger / Jason Voorhees / Chucky / Ghostface. Favorite Ships: #FinnRey / #Ponnix / #SkyRogue / #SkyJade / #Scoundress
 / #SpiderWitch / #Pepperony / #Bretty / #Fosterson / #Steggy / #Langdyne / #Winter13 / #Claurasha (aka Polyamorous Clint/Laura/Natasha) / I have a soft spot for #Romanogers ;)

summary: Star Wars The Black Series Star Wars Battlefront II Imperial Shock Trooper Electronic Voice Changer Helmet - Fresh Pics....
caption:
Star Wars The Black Series Star Wars Battlefront II Imperial Shock Trooper Electronic Voice Changer Helmet - Fresh Pics.

Although we’ve seen this before and plenty of leaks, drool over some official images that came out in the press pack. Available officially at Gamestop, it’s also available from plenty of sellers already.

tags: just when you thought it was safe to go back in the water
summary: Omg, it's my birthday today, and the return of the Clone Wars is the most unexpected gift! Tbh, I fear it too. First, because a...
question: Omg, it's my birthday today, and the return of the Clone Wars is the most unexpected gift! Tbh, I fear it too. First, because a lot of what I heard of the show's supposed finale sounds lame (like Ahsoka's coming back to have new adventures as if nothing much happened), but if the creators actually come with new surprising stuff, then I am in danger of having to reevaluate my old beloved, put-into-boxes characters yet again. I want more content, but at the same time I don't? So confusing!
answer:
Happy Birthday!

I hear you, friend. From what I hear (which is basically just rumors and speculations at this point), they plan to tidy up and officially put out the episodes they already had in the works like the Utapau and Bad Batch arcs, plus the Siege of Mandalore. So, basically, they’ll be finishing up the stuff they’ve already written and partially released in one form or another.

I want to be excited. I want to feel the old joy I had at new Star Wars material. Since the end of Rebels and The Last Jedi, though, my interest in Star Wars in general has been waning. Maybe this show will help revive my interest once it finally hits my screens. Or maybe it will just feel like another shameless cash grab which fills me with disappointment and rage.

title: Come Back to Me
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LzJPWR

by Dragons_Heart

Five years ago, Anakin Skywalker fell to the Dark Side. Five years ago, he denounced himself and became Darth Vader. Five years ago, he nearly died. Now, Darth Vader is a powerful Lord of the Sith, unshakeable. With rebellion rising in the Outer Rim territories, he needs assistance from one pirate captain, and his oddly familiar first mate.

Words: 2898, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Obikin Week 2k18

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Prequel Trilogy, Star Wars Original Trilogy, Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008) - All Media Types
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker | Darth Vader, Anakin Skywalker, Darth Vader, Hondo Ohnaka
  • Relationships: Obi-Wan Kenobi/Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi/Darth Vader, Obi-Wan Kenobi & Anakin Skywalker
  • Additional Tags: Obikin Week, Canon Divergent, Canon Compliant, Post Revenge of the Sith, post mustafar, Space Pirate!Obi-Wan, Previous Relationship, Established Relationship, Mutual Pining, Angst, Angst and Feels


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LzJPWR

summary: For @michaelathewordsmith​…based on the songs “Begin Again” and “Clean…both by Taylor Swift…Enjoy! You sucked in a breath as you...
caption:
For @michaelathewordsmith​…based on the songs “Begin Again” and “Clean…both by Taylor Swift…Enjoy!

You sucked in a breath as you entered the coffee shop. It had been…a long time since you had been here. It used to be a regular spot for you. The baristas and servers knew you by name. Hell, you even met some of your best friends from being a regular. The café was your spot, your corner to relax and be with your thoughts. You never thought you’d leave the place.

That was, until, your previous partner broke up with you.

You felt like dirt, to put kindly. You couldn’t face the world in your hurting state. There were days where your heart ached so much that you wouldn’t even leave your bed. Curling into yourself was a regular occurrence.

Of course your friends tried to help. They would stay on the phone listening to you cry. A few times, they came over to make sure you were eating. They were helping your through getting over him. They all knew how unexpected the break up had been for you.

Eventually, enough was enough. You were sick of feeling broken, sick of feeling like something was missing, sick of feeling unwanted. To the world, it would have seemed like a switch was flicked.

You woke up on time and went through your usual routine. You played your favorite music that always could put a smile on your face. You cooked and ate; you returned to your normal.

Rain came pouring down when I was drowning
That’s when I could finally breathe
And by morning, gone was any trace of you, I think I am finally clean (Clean)

Forcing a genuine smile, you walked up to the counter. The barista greeted you happily. You returned the sentiment and traded casual speak. You could tell they were a tad concerned, but their joy at seeing you again kept them from questioning. You appreciated it.

Once your order was in, you glanced around the shop. You smiled when you saw your usual corner open. Like always, you walked over and sat down. You pulled out your laptop and set up your little work station.

Knowing how long your drink usually took, you set to work right away.

As usual, you got a little too deep into your work. You were so focused that you didn’t hear your friend call for you drink. Just as well, you didn’t see them talking to a ginger and pointing in your direction.

“Y/N?” an unexpected voice piped up.

You jumped slightly while looking up. A man with ginger hair and blue eyes was calmly smiling down at you. He held a cup and a mug. He smirked when he realized how bewildered you looked.

“My apologies. I didn’t mean to frighten you,” he started, “Your friend asked me to bring your drink over since you didn’t hear them.”
You blushed from embarrassment. “Oh crud! Uh, thank you. You didn’t have to do that.”
“And let your drink get cold?” he teased, setting down your mug, “I couldn’t imagine a worse torture.”
You chuckled. “Then I’ll spare you the details of my late nights here.”

He let out a laugh of his own, one that fluttered your stomach. He glanced around a moment, thinking of his next words. He lowered his gaze.

“Would it be all right if I joined you?”
You grinned. “Of course!” You yanked your bag from the chair. “Have a seat. I’m Y/N, obviously.”
He grinned. “Armitage. So you’re a regular?”
You nodded. “For the most part. I was…gone for a stretch, but I’m back to working and it feels-”
“Refreshing?”
You titled your head to the side. “Yeah. How did you…”
He lowered his gaze again. “I…I recently went through a rough patch of my own. Returning to normal feels relieving.”
You nodded. “Couldn’t agree more.”

The two of you continued on talking. There might have been only a small bit of work done, but you couldn’t care less. In the moment, neither of you wanted a relationship. However, you two did want a friendship. So, for awhile one, the two of you met at the coffee shop each day. You’d talk about anything and everything until Armitage had to go. Then you’d work.

It wouldn’t be for another couple of years until you, on one fateful night, acted on the growing feelings in your core. That night was filled with a passion that carried your blooming relationship.

And you throw your head back laughing like a little kid
I think it’s strange that you think I’m funny ‘cause he never did
I’ve been spending the last eight months
Thinking all love ever does is break and burn and end
But on a Wednesday in a cafe I watched it begin again (Begin Again)

Perma-tags: @beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeep @ttelesilla @jumperswellies @caitsymichelle13 @frostbyte-horan @bestillmystuckyheart​ @littlestfangirl​ @anali-022506​ @krylo-rxn​ @ilovetvshowsblog​ @yllwtaxi @mimikyu-of-death
Semi-tags: @bi-shy-and-ready-to-die

blog.name: kimineechan
blog.title: Little pieces of trash

summary: I’m on Zedge! Now you can use my art as Wallpaper on your phone or tablet. You can find them at the Zedge by the reylo tag. Or...
caption:
I’m on Zedge!

Now you can use my art as Wallpaper on your phone or tablet. You can find them at the Zedge by the reylo tag. Or my account  :

https://www.zedge.net/profile/kimineechan


Bônus:I have uploaded some of the epic reylo moments on TLJ , you can use them as ringtones or just play them have reylo vibes <3

You can access Zedge from the app or your navigator. It’s free to use.

summary: Star Wars Mighty Muggs Luke Skywalker X-Wing Pilot Revealed At SDCC-Hasbro Official Photography. Still trawling through the...
caption:
Star Wars Mighty Muggs Luke Skywalker X-Wing Pilot Revealed At SDCC-Hasbro Official Photography.

Still trawling through the Hasbro press pack (2gb!) of images and reformatting just for you. This cool looking Mugg as per others in the line:

  • Comes with 3 different interchangeable facial expressions
  • Press button to twist head and reveal different looks

Tons of others to chose from. Pick up some Star Wars Mighty Muggs today

summary: That's no moon... but it's great acrylic painting of a space station. Polissa Danielle's Star Wars Fan Art is fully operational...
caption: That’s no moon… but it’s great acrylic painting of a space station. Polissa Danielle’s Star Wars Fan Art is fully operational for National Moon Day.

blog.name: toomanyfandomstowrite
blog.title: Aroace From Outer Space
blog.description:
She/her, aroace, going to school for forensic anthropology.

Gimme all the gays. And the bis. And the straights. And every other configuration of being. Love you all.

(Pedo/Incest/Abuse Shippers Don’t Interact. No one likes you.)

title: I'm crying
body:
I’m so emotionally unprepared for more SWTCW. It was the first cartoon I ever got emotionally invested in. It was the first show with characters so amazing that I laughed and cried with them onscreen. Just hearing Rex’s voice again in the trailer had me tearing up.

This is it

This is how I die
